Class FeedDisplayer

  • java.lang.Object
    • FeedDisplayer

  • public class FeedDisplayer
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for handling the RSSReader's output to terminal
    Author:
    Andrew Bacon, Holly French, Veronica Lynn CS 204, Spring 2013 date: 16 April 2013

    • Constructor Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void displayByDate(java.util.ArrayList<com.sun.syndication.feed.synd.SyndEntryImpl> posts)
      displayByDate is called by RSSReader.display() Displays articles by date rather than by news source.

      displayByFeeds is called by RSSReader.display() Given a list of feeds, displays the posts from each feed in the order provided

    • Method Detail

      • displayByDate

        public void displayByDate(java.util.ArrayList<com.sun.syndication.feed.synd.SyndEntryImpl> posts)
        displayByDate is called by RSSReader.display() Displays articles by date rather than by news source.
        Parameters:
        posts - sorted list of posts to display

      • displayByFeeds

        public void displayByFeeds(java.util.ArrayList<com.sun.syndication.feed.synd.SyndFeedImpl> curFeeds)
        displayByFeeds is called by RSSReader.display() Given a list of feeds, displays the posts from each feed in the order provided
        Parameters:
        curFeeds - the list of feeds to display

      • printEntry

        public void printEntry(com.sun.syndication.feed.synd.SyndEntryImpl entry,
              int articleNum,
              java.lang.String entrydate)
        Prints an entry to the terminal
        Parameters:
        entry - The entry to display
        articleNum - The article number (number per feed)
        entrydate - The date of the entry (empty string if date doesn't exist)

      • isPrintable

        public boolean isPrintable(com.sun.syndication.feed.synd.SyndEntryImpl entry,
                  java.util.Date since)
        Determines whether a given entry should be printed or not Based on REGEX title matching and the --since and --newest flags
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry to check
        since - only display posts after this date
        Returns:
        true if entry should be printed, else false

      • matchesTitleRegex

        public boolean matchesTitleRegex(com.sun.syndication.feed.synd.SyndEntryImpl entry)
        Checks whether an entry title matches the title regex
        Parameters:
        entry - The entry to check
        Returns:
        True if the regex matches or if regex is unspecified, else false
